title: A Boy Raised by Gods, Will Be the Strongest - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Shounen
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adopted Children   Adopted Protagonist   Beastkin   Beautiful Female Lead   Caring Protagonist   Demi-Humans   Demon Lord   Demons   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Parents   Dragons   Elemental Magic   Elves   Fantasy World   Goddesses   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Heroes   Jack of All Trades   Kind Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Magic Beasts   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Strong to Stronger   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   World Travel

description: Will was a boy left to his fate in the middle of nowhere, but his luck changed when the gods gave him another destiny. That child who was destined to die is now destined to become the mightiest of all with the help of the god of the sword, the god of magic and the goddess of sanction, Will’s adventures are about to begin!>
